message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand that $105 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can sell the product to you for $135. It's a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. This is my final offer, as I can always buy from John for $100. Let me know if you're interested.
